review: Bought for my daughter's room. She loves it
author: Gina

review: Works well but the apps are better on my Roku.  Time will tell.
author: FooBar

review: Great product. Easy setup. Remote is easy to use.
author: bh

review: I was so excited to get this. I am tired of the same old tv shows!!  It was so easy to install too. They show you a great how to video also. For all of this the price is incredible!  I strongly recommend getting the Fire stick Tv!
author: Carol B "Carol D Bradford"

review: Excellent product. Now I can watch Netflix on any tv.
author: Marie Lucey

review: I love it !!! It was so easy to install, and now we can watch the Amazon prime movies and series,as well as have Netflix and Hulu along with a few other options right at out fingertips.  I would recoommend the firestick to anyone who has a t.v. with an HDMI port to support it. And the cost is so low you could buy one for all the t.v.s in your home.
author: tamra D.

review: Glitchy. Bought it to stop the pauses from buffering. Disappointed. Better to stick with the blu ray player. It at least updates frequently.
author: HappyMamma Bear
